name: MindPortal
all_locations: London, England, United Kingdom; San Francisco, CA, USA
long_description: At MindPortal, we are leading the way in human-AI telepathy, developing non-invasive neural interfaces that transform how humans interact with AI. Our mission is to streamline communication by allowing users to interact with AI through thought alone, bypassing conventional methods like typing or speaking. Our state-of-the-art technology interprets human thoughts into AI interactions, offering a real-time thought engagement experience. This innovative approach not only improves communication efficiency but also fosters a closer, symbiotic relationship between humans and AI. We are dedicated to advancing humanity into a future of boundless possibilities and prosperity, where human potential is greatly enhanced through our groundbreaking technology.
